title: "mefunistatus"
output: html_document

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

library(tidyverse)

```

```{r} 
load("osym_data_2017.RData")
arrange(osym_data_2017,exam_type,desc(min_score))
sirali1 <- arrange(osym_data_2017,desc(min_score),exam_type)
sirali2 <- sirali1 %>% mutate(sira=row_number())
MEFS <- filter(sirali2, university_name == "MEF ÜNÝVERSÝTESÝ")
MEFS2 <- filter(MEFS,sira<1000)
```

```{r}
ggplot(MEFS2, aes(sira,program_name),e) + geom_point()

```
